TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IObservable`1<+ T>
generic <typename T> public interface class IObservable

span.span: The object that provides notification information.

summary.span: 定义基于推送的通知的提供程序。

span.span: Defines a provider for push-based notification.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和 接口为基于推送的通知（也称为观察者设计模式）提供通用机制。The and interfaces provide a generalized mechanism for push-based notification, also known as the observer design pattern. 接口表示发送通知的类（提供程序） ; 接口表示接收它们的类（观察者）。 The interface represents the class that sends notifications (the provider); the interface represents the class that receives them (the observer). `T`表示提供通知信息的类。`T` represents the class that provides the notification information. 在某些基于推送的通知中， 实现和`T`可以表示相同类型。In some push-based notifications, the implementation and `T` can represent the same type. 提供程序必须实现一个方法， 该方法指示观察者要接收基于推送的通知。The provider must implement a single method, , that indicates that an observer wants to receive push-based notifications. 方法的调用方传递观察程序的实例。Callers to the method pass an instance of the observer. 方法返回一个实现，该实现使观察程序可以在提供程序停止发送通知之前随时取消通知。The method returns an implementation that enables observers to cancel notifications at any time before the provider has stopped sending them. 在任意给定时间，给定提供程序可以有零个、一个或多个观察程序。At any given time, a given provider may have zero, one, or multiple observers. 提供程序负责存储对观察程序的引用，并确保它们在发送通知之前有效。The provider is responsible for storing references to observers and ensuring that they are valid before it sends notifications. 接口不对观察器数或发送通知的顺序作出任何假设。The interface does not make any assumptions about the number of observers or the order in which notifications are sent. 提供程序通过调用方法向观察者发送以下三种类型的通知：The provider sends the following three kinds of notifications to the observer by calling methods: - 当前数据。The current data. 提供程序可以调用方法来传递`T`包含当前数据、更改的数据或新数据的对象。The provider can call the method to pass the observer a `T` object that has current data, changed data, or fresh data. - 错误情况。An error condition. 提供程序可以调用方法，通知观察者发生了某种错误情况。The provider can call the method to notify the observer that some error condition has occurred. - 无更多数据。No further data. 提供程序可以调用方法，通知观察者它已完成发送通知。The provider can call the method to notify the observer that it has finished sending notifications. ## Examples 下面的示例演示观察者设计模式。The following example illustrates the observer design pattern. 它定义`Location`包含纬度和经度信息的类。It defines a `Location` class that contains latitude and longitude information. [!code-csharp[System.IObserver.Class#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/cs/provider.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.IObserver.Class#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/vb/provider.vb#5)] `LocationTracker` 类 提供实现。The `LocationTracker` class provides the implementation. 向`TrackLocation`其方法传递包含纬度`Location`和经度数据的可以为 null 的对象。Its `TrackLocation` method is passed a nullable `Location` object that contains the latitude and longitude data. 如果值不`null` `TrackLocation` 为 ，则方法调用每个观察程序的方法。 `Location`If the `Location` value is not `null`, the `TrackLocation` method calls the method of each observer. [!code-csharp[System.IObserver.Class#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/cs/provider.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.IObserver.Class#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/vb/provider.vb#6)] 如果值为 `null` ，则该`TrackLocation`方法将实例化对象，如下例所示。 `LocationUnknownException` `Location`If the `Location` value is `null`, the `TrackLocation` method instantiates a `LocationUnknownException` object, which is shown in the following example. 然后，它调用每个观察程序的方法并`LocationUnknownException`向其传递对象。It then calls each observer's method and passes it the `LocationUnknownException` object. 请注意， 派生自，但不添加任何新成员。 `LocationUnknownException`Note that `LocationUnknownException` derives from , but does not add any new members. [!code-csharp[System.IObserver.Class#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/cs/provider.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.IObserver.Class#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/vb/provider.vb#7)] 观察者通过调用其`TrackLocation` 方法来注册以接收来自对象的通知，该方法将对观察者对象的引用分配给私有泛型对象。Observers register to receive notifications from a `TrackLocation` object by calling its method, which assigns a reference to the observer object to a private generic object. 方法返回一个`Unsubscriber`对象，该对象是一个实现，它使观察程序可以停止接收通知。The method returns an `Unsubscriber` object, which is an implementation that enables observers to stop receiving notifications. `LocationTracker`类还 `EndTransmission` 包含方法。The `LocationTracker` class also includes an `EndTransmission` method. 当没有更多的位置数据可用时，方法会调用每个观察程序的方法，然后清除观察程序的内部列表。When no further location data is available, the method calls each observer's method and then clears the internal list of observers. 在此示例中， `LocationReporter`类提供了实现。In this example, the `LocationReporter` class provides the implementation. 它显示有关当前控制台位置的信息。It displays information about the current location to the console. 其构造函数包含`name`一个参数，该参数`LocationReporter`可使实例在其字符串输出中标识自身。Its constructor includes a `name` parameter, which enables the `LocationReporter` instance to identify itself in its string output. 它还包括一个`Subscribe`方法，该方法将调用提供程序的方法。It also includes a `Subscribe` method, which wraps a call to the provider's method. 这允许方法为私有变量分配返回的引用。This allows the method to assign the returned reference to a private variable. 类还包括一个`Unsubscribe` 方法，该方法调用方法返回的对象的方法。 `LocationReporter`The `LocationReporter` class also includes an `Unsubscribe` method, which calls the method of the object that is returned by the method. 下面的代码定义`LocationReporter`类。The following code defines the `LocationReporter` class. [!code-csharp[System.IObserver.Class#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/cs/observer.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.IObserver.Class#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/vb/observer.vb#8)] 然后，以下代码实例化提供程序和观察程序。The following code then instantiates the provider and the observer. [!code-csharp[System.IObserver.Class#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/cs/program.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.IObserver.Class#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/vb/module1.vb#9)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.IDisposable Subscribe(class System.IObserver`1<!T> observer) cil managed
Public Function Subscribe (observer As IObserver(Of Out T)) As IDisposable

span.span: The object that is to receive notifications.

summary.span: 通知提供程序：某观察程序将要接收通知。

span.span: Notifies the provider that an observer is to receive notifications.

returns.span: 对允许观察者在提供程序发送完通知前停止接收这些通知的接口的引用。

span.span: A reference to an interface that allows observers to stop receiving notifications before the provider has finished sending them.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须调用方法为基于推送的通知注册观察程序。The method must be called to register an observer for push-based notifications. 方法的典型实现执行以下操作：A typical implementation of the method does the following: - 它在集合对象中存储对观察程序的引用，例如对象。It stores a reference to the observer in a collection object, such as a object. - 它将返回对接口的引用。It returns a reference to an interface. 这使观察程序可以在提供程序完成发送通知之前取消订阅（即停止接收通知），并调用订阅服务器的方法。This enables observers to unsubscribe (that is, to stop receiving notifications) before the provider has finished sending them and called the subscriber's method. 在任意给定时间， 实现的特定实例负责处理所有订阅并通知所有订阅服务器。At any given time, a particular instance of an implementation is responsible for handling all subscriptions and notifying all subscribers. 除非特定实现的文档指示，否则观察程序应不会对实现进行任何假设，如多个观察程序将接收的通知的顺序。Unless the documentation for a particular implementation indicates otherwise, observers should make no assumptions about the implementation, such as the order of notifications that multiple observers will receive. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了报告纬度和经度信息的应用程序的方法。The following example illustrates the method for an application that reports latitude and longitude information. 它定义存储对所有观察程序的引用的集合对象。It defines an collection object that stores references to all observers. 它还返回一个名为`Unsubscriber`的私有类，该类实现接口，并使订阅服务器停止接收事件通知。It also returns a private class named `Unsubscriber` that implements the interface and enables subscribers to stop receiving event notifications. 有关完整示例，请参阅主题的 "示例" 部分。See the Example section of the topic for the complete example. [!code-csharp[System.IObserver.Class#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/cs/provider.cs#13)] [!code-vb[System.IObserver.Class#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/vb/provider.vb#13)]
